annotations.description: An infinitely Crushable take on the Pimm's Cup The Cool Aunt Pimm was created by Annie Williams Pierce of Law Bird in Columbus Ohio. In this drink she master...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Cool Aunt Pimm

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Amontillado Sherry
.75oz (22.5ml) Blanco Tequila
.25oz (7.5ml) Lemon Juice
1 Heaping Barspoon Raspberry Preserves
Pinch Of Sea Salt

Shake and pour
Top Approx. 1.5oz (45ml) Cucumber Tonic Water
Add crushed ice
Mint Sprig/Lemon Twist Garnish

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Bvm_U8A4dQ
title: Cool Aunt Pimm
